Magmeld Emissary Leader Lada:
Magold was discovered in nezapomenete times elven masters-elementals.
Now there are cats. In many villages you can find stunning monuments of their ancient culture.
But still there must be careful. Beauty Magolda napisami, but there's plenty and dangers. This region conceals a terrible secret.
So terrible that all residents of Magolda now cry out for help. Could You go and help them?
